application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 2 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T1, T4) - Raise the crown to approx 4m without removing any scaffold limbs. Crown thin by 20%. Reduce extraneous growth by no more than 1-2m but do not reduce the height or the overall shape of the tree. 1 x Ash (applicants ref. T2) - Raise the crown to approx 4m without removing any scaffold limbs. Crown thin by 15%. Reduce extraneous growth by no more than 1-2m and reduce selected branches growing towards light. Remove maturing epicormic growth from main stem to give a lift of approx 5m over road. Remove dead wood. Do not reduce the height or the overall shape of the tree.1 x Ash (applicants ref. T3) - Raise the crown to approx 4m without removing any scaffold limbs. Crown thin by 15%. Reduce extraneous growth by no more than 1-2m and reduce selected branches growing towards light. Remove dead wood. Do not reduce the height or the overall shape of the tree.
